thread.section_title: The Bryant Park Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great hotel, INCREDIBLE staff.
thread.title_full: Great hotel, INCREDIBLE staff. - Review of The Bryant Park Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Stephanie A
title: Great hotel, INCREDIBLE staff.
text:
Lovely modern hotel in a great location. We celebrated a milestone birthday and the entire staff went above and beyond to make the birthday girl feel incredibly special.
Spacious room with a terrace that overlooked Bryant Park and the NY Public Library. Very special place to stay.
